DOC.brief_title: Chloroquinoxaline Sulfonamide Treating Patients With Stage IV Colorectal Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I. Assess antitumor activity toxicity chloroquinoxaline sulfonamide patient stage IV colorectal cancer . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive chloroquinoxaline sulfonamide IV 1 hour weekly 4 consecutive week . Treatment continue every 6 week absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow least 30 day . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 16-25 patient accrue study within 8 month .
